document.full_text: the goal is to capture most of the 200,000 tons of textile and apparel materials that new yorkers throw away each year but that could be reused instead, reducing the city's garbage disposal costs.
document.title: a new york debut for textile recycling
lines_and_colors: the goal is to capture most of the 200,000 tons of textile and apparel materials that new yorkers throw away each year but that could be reused instead, reducing the city's garbage disposal costs.
